title: Advocating for a change: IHCL's Puneet Chhatwal pushes for 'industry' status in the hospitality sector
description: IHCL's MD & CEO Puneet Chhatwal emphasised the need for granting industry status to the hospitality sector. Chhatwal highlighted the longstanding issue of being taxed as a luxury, with the sector facing the highest tax rates and limited exemptions. He expressed that this change is not only crucial for IHCL but for the entire industry.
